Title: Relates to providing for taxpayer gifts for uterine fibroids education and establishes the uterine fibroids education fund
Summary: Relates to providing for taxpayer gifts for uterine fibroids education; establishes the uterine fibroids education fund.
LawCode: Add §§209-R & 630-M, Tax L; add §97-bbbbb, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to providing for taxpayer gifts for uterine fibroids education and establishing the uterine fibroids education fund
